title: Boat ownership by age in the U.S. 2013
summary: This statistic presents the distribution of Boat ownership by in the U.S. in 2013 , sorted 2013 Age .
According to the source , it was found that 6 % of the boat in the U.S. used 2013 group .
gold: The statistic depicts the boat ownership rate by age in the U.S. in 2013 . 7.5 percent of the respondents aged 45 to 64 years own a boat .
